title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Web-Based Learning Service Access Design: Practical

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically manage mathematical problem-solving data using ReST architecture-based web services
Learners can design and implement collaborative mathematical inquiry activities using digital tools such as wikis
Learners can generate various mathematical representations (graphs, tables, diagrams) through web-based learning service approaches
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
